Welcome to Fantasy Draft’s documentation!¶

main Creates a fantasy football draft simulation

Author: Zach Sahlin

main.main()¶
Returns

none

draft A fantasy football draft

Author: Zach Sahlin

class draft.Draft(num_teams)¶

A fantasy football draft

calculate_draft_order(num_teams)¶

Calculates the draft order based on the number of teams using a snake draft :param num_teams: number of teams in the league

create_teams(num_teams)¶

Creates the teams in the draft :param num_teams: number of teams in the league

draft_player(player_name, team)¶

Drafts a player to a team :param player_name: the name of the player to be drafted :param team: the team the player will be drafted to

end()¶

Ends the draft and projects rankings

get_next_team()¶

Gets the team with the next pick

get_players(pos)¶

Gets the players with position :param pos: the position of the players to get

next_turn()¶

Takes the next turn in the draft

read_players(filename)¶

Reads in the player data from a csv file

Parameters

filename – name of the file with the player data

start()¶

Starts the draft

team A fantasy football team

Author: Zach Sahlin

class team.Team¶

A fantasy football team
